title: Lp gains after placements.
body:
Hello I went 5-5 in placements and placed plat 5. Afterwards I've won 3 games straight giving me +13 +12 and +13. Then my first loss was -22 I don't understand.
Is there a reason why the LP gains are so low? I'm playing against all people who are the same rank if not higher.
I'm just concerned if this is a bug and I should stop playing for now or if this is the case for everyone thanks.

replies.body: LP adjustments haven't changed, so the information in the [matchmaking guide](http://matchm) still applies.  If matchmaking places you against a team that thinks you may win against, then you could end up losing more points if you actually end up losing.  You're in a solid streak right now and climbing rapidly, so it may cost you more LP until matchmaking places you where you best fit.  You'll see things level out as you continue to play!

This is absolute bullshit. I've been playing since season 3 and I've never had garbage LP gains and losses like this after a new season started. I am 11-3  ranked and I just lost 19 LP while my previous match, a win, was +16 LP.

The best part about the ranked season is the very beginning when we all have awesome LP gains for awhile and can climb well. This feel's like an absolute slap in the face.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YUGXM5j1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T17:35:12.070+0000)
>
> LP adjustments haven't changed, so the information in the [matchmaking guide](http://matchm) still applies.  If matchmaking places you against a team that thinks you may win against, then you could end up losing more points if you actually end up losing.  You're in a solid streak right now and climbing rapidly, so it may cost you more LP until matchmaking places you where you best fit.  You'll see things level out as you continue to play!

Okay no.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5h67ce/mmr_problems_12082016_very_low_lp_gains/

There's a massive amount of people with the issue. 

A friend of mine has MMR a whole tier above where he is and is still gaining very little. 

There's a bug (... how do you guys... always have a bug with the ranking system at the start of the season again?) and you guys need to acknowledge it, not hide from it.
Its happening to alot of people rn including myself, my advice is to wait until it gets fixed as its pretty bs lol

A word of advice from someone who's been there:

Tank your rating. It's faster to fall to where the system wants you and to climb back out than it is to tread water doing what you're doing. As far as I can tell from my own experience, if the system wants you to go lower, it will force you there long before it moves your MMR to match your tier.
